From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To enable terminal notification about pending output from other Telnet connections, use the **notify** command in line configuration mode. To disable notifications, use the **no** form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

Examples: In the following example, notification of pending output from connections is enabled on virtual terminal lines 0 to 4:
ExtraInfo: This command sets a line to inform a user that has multiple, concurrent Telnet connections when output is pending on a connection other than the current one.

RelatedCmds.description: Configures a line to inform a user that has multiple, concurrent Telnet connections when output is pending on a connection other than the current one.
